## Problem / Use Case

Describe the problem you're trying to solve or the use case for this feature.

Example: "I want to filter tool calls by name so I can focus on specific tools during debugging."

## Proposed Solution

Describe your ideal solution. How would it work from a user's perspective?

## Alternatives Considered

What other approaches have you thought about? Why is your proposed solution better?

## Additional Context

- Screenshots, mockups, or examples from similar tools
- Links to related issues or discussions
- Any implementation ideas (optional)
